name: Watch Your Step!
description:
Developer's note: This was originally intended to be an entry in Brackey's Jam 2020.1. Due to a very late start (day three) and technical issues, I didn't make it in time. So I polished it up a bit, fixed a few bugs, and now releasing it as is! A lot of people wanted to see this happen, and as a result, I wanted to finish it.

This release would not have been possible without motivation from the Brackey's Discord Server! Thanks for all your support and I hope this lives up to your expectations!

-

Sometimes, it seems like your world is falling apart. In this game, it really does! With so little time, explore as much as you can for secrets before your inevitable doom!

Made in four days for Brackey's Jam 2020.1!

-

Featured Let’s Play: GPhobia

https://youtu.be/4j8rH1LQJrI

-

Known issues:

- There is no pause menu. The UI is a li

  • There is no pause menu. The UI is a lie.
  • There is no cake. The cake is a lie.

-

Want to support development?

Feel free to fill out a user testing survey here!
